data.title: Holly Montag Gets Married the Same Day as Lauren Conrad!
data.meta_description: Heidi Montag and Spencer Pratt were on-hand for only one of the special ceremonies
data.text:
Lauren Conrad wasn't the only star from The Hills to say "I Do" this weekend!

E! News confirms Holly Montag and her fiancé Richie Wilson tied the knot Saturday in the reality star's hometown of Crested Butte, Colo.

"I married the love of my life," Holly told People magazine who first reported the news. The wedding was absolutely "magical and intimate."

Heidi Montag and Spencer Pratt, who were featured on The Hills and I'm A Celebrity…Get Me Out of Here! with Holly, were in attendance for the big day.

"Yesterday was the most beautiful wedding I could imagine!" Heidi shared on Twitter after the ceremony. "Wishing you all the blessings and joy! Love you!"

In a surprise coincidence, Holly's nuptials occurred the exact same day L.C. exchanged vows to her longtime boyfriend, William Tell.

The fashion designer married the University of Southern California graduate along the California coast in an ultra-private ceremony.

But before you start spreading rumors about a wedding battle, the Montag and Pratt family appear to be happy for L.C.
